title: This Week's Top Stories - Trump Is Acquitted & the Texas Energy Crisis Deepens
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Trump Is Acquitted & the Texas Energy Crisis Deepens
description:
Donald Trump is acquitted in his impeachment trial, conservatives blame liberals as a winter storm leaves Texans without power, and Ted Cruz gets backlash for vacationing in Cancun, Mexico.



To help fight food insecurity in Texas resulting from recent snowstorms, go to dailyshow.com/HoustonFoodBank.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
